001package net.tvburger.jdl.linear.main;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Pair;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Threads;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.datasets.SyntheticDataSets;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.LinearRegression;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.basis.BasisFunction;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.basis.PolynomialFunction;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.optimizer.*;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
012import net.tvburger.jdl.plots.Plot;
013
014import java.util.Arrays;
015import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
016import java.util.Map;
017
018public class ModelL1Regularization {
019
020    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
021    public static <O extends LinearModelOptimizer<N> & IterativeOptimizer<N>, N extends Number> void main(String[] args) {
022        JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> numberTypeSupport = (JavaNumberTypeSupport<N>) JavaNumberTypeSupport.DOUBLE;
023        float lambda1 = 0.001f;
024        float lambda2 = 0.0001f;
025
026        VanillaGradientDescentOptimizer<N> gd = new VanillaGradientDescentOptimizer<>(numberTypeSupport);
027        VanillaGradientDescentOptimizer<N> l1 = new VanillaGradientDescentOptimizer<>(numberTypeSupport);
028        l1.setInterceptor(new L1Regularization<>(numberTypeSupport.valueOf(lambda1)));
029        VanillaGradientDescentOptimizer<N> l2 = new VanillaGradientDescentOptimizer<>(numberTypeSupport);
030        l2.setInterceptor(new L2Regularization<>(numberTypeSupport.valueOf(lambda2)));
031        VanillaGradientDescentOptimizer<N> net = new VanillaGradientDescentOptimizer<>(numberTypeSupport);
032        net.setInterceptor(new ElasticNet<>(numberTypeSupport.valueOf(lambda1), numberTypeSupport.valueOf(lambda2)));
033
034//        Map<String, O> optimizers = Map.of("L1(0.01)", (O) l1, "L2(0.01)", (O) l2, "vanilla", (O) gd, "net(0.01,0.01)", (O) net);
035        Map<String, O> optimizers = Map.of("L1", (O) l1);
036        for (Map.Entry<String, O> optimizerEntry : optimizers.entrySet()) {
037            showForNumberType(numberTypeSupport, optimizerEntry.getKey(), optimizerEntry.getValue(), 10_000_000, 0.1f, 3, 0);
038        }
039    }
040
041    private static <O extends LinearModelOptimizer<N> & IterativeOptimizer<N>, N extends Number> void showForNumberType(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport, String title, O optimizer, int epochs, float learningRate, int m, long sleep) {
042        LinearRegression<N> regression = createClosedSolutionFitting(typeSupport, optimizer);
043
044        Plot mrePlot = new Plot("RME " + typeSupport.name() + " [" + title + "] lr=" + learningRate + " m=" + m);
045        mrePlot.display();
046
047        Plot fitPlot = new Plot("Fit " + typeSupport.name() + " [" + title + "] lr=" + learningRate + " m=" + m);
048        fitPlot.setYRange(-2, 2);
049        fitPlot.plotDataSet(regression.getTrainSet(), "Train Set");
050        fitPlot.display();
051
052        Plot weightPlot = new Plot("Absolute sum of weights " + typeSupport.name() + " [" + title + "] lr=" + learningRate + " m=" + m);
053        weightPlot.display();
054
055        optimizer.setLearningRate(learningRate);
056        optimizer.setEpochs(epochs);
057        optimizer.setEpochCompletionListener(IterativeOptimizer.initializer(model -> {
058//                    model.setParameters((N[]) new Double[]{-0.233, 166.17957, -3589.525, 31330.045, -142827.98, 377871.28, -602523.25, 571137.8, -296352.97, 64788.945});
059//                    model.setParameters((N[]) new Double[]{-0.233, 1.17957, -3.525, 3.045, -7.98, 1.28, -6.0, 5.0, -3.0, 6.0});
060//                    N factor = model.getCurrentNumberType().valueOf(1.0f);
061//                    for (int i = 0; i < model.getParameters().length; i++) {
062//                        model.setParameter(i, model.getCurrentNumberType().multiply(model.getParameters()[i], factor));
063//                    }
064                },
065                IterativeOptimizer.sample(250, (epoch, model, trainSet, o) -> {
066                    Pair<Float, Map<String, Float>> currentRmes = regression.calculateRMEs(model);
067                    mrePlot.addToSeries("Train RME", new float[]{epoch}, new float[]{currentRmes.left()});
068                    for (Map.Entry<String, Float> currentRmeEntry : currentRmes.right().entrySet()) {
069                        mrePlot.addToSeries(currentRmeEntry.getKey() + " RME", new float[]{epoch}, new float[]{currentRmeEntry.getValue()});
070                    }
071                    mrePlot.redraw();
072                    weightPlot.addToSeries("Total Weights", new float[]{epoch}, new float[]{(float) (Arrays.stream(model.getParameters()).mapToDouble(p -> model.getCurrentNumberType().absolute(p).doubleValue()).sum())});
073                    weightPlot.redraw();
074                    fitPlot.plotTargetOutput(model, "Fit");
075                    fitPlot.redraw();
076                    if (epoch == epochs || true) {
077                        System.out.println(title + ": " + Arrays.toString(model.getParameters()));
078                    }
079                    Threads.sleepSilently(sleep);
080                })));
081        Threads.runAsynchronously(() -> regression.fitComplexity(m));
082    }
083
084    private static <N extends Number> LinearRegression<N> createClosedSolutionFitting(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport, LinearModelOptimizer<N> optimizer) {
085        SyntheticDataSets.SyntheticDataSet<N> dataSetGenerator = SyntheticDataSets.sinus(typeSupport);
086        BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator = new PolynomialFunction.Generator<>(typeSupport);
087        return create(dataSetGenerator, basisFunctionGenerator, optimizer);
088    }
089
090    public static <N extends Number> LinearRegression<N> create(SyntheticDataSets.SyntheticDataSet<N> dataSetGenerator, BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator, LinearModelOptimizer<N> optimizer) {
091        dataSetGenerator.setRandomSeed(165);
092        dataSetGenerator.setNoiseScale(0.5f);
093        DataSet<N> trainSet = dataSetGenerator.load(100);
094        DataSet<N> testSet = dataSetGenerator.load(10);
095        Map<String, DataSet<N>> testSets = new LinkedHashMap<>();
096        testSets.put("Test Set", testSet);
097        return new LinearRegression<>(basisFunctionGenerator, trainSet, testSets, optimizer);
098    }
099
100}
